import React from 'react' import { NavLink,Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { useCart } from 'react-use-cart' const Nav = () => { const {totalItems} = useCart(); return (
Navbar
  • Home
  • Products
Cart({totalItems})
) } export default Nav
